p: For all analyses hereafter epidemiological years were defined as from 1 July Year 1 through 30 June Year 2 (e.g., reference to Year 2004 includes the period from 07/01/2003 to 06/30/2004). In accordance, climatic seasons were defined as follows: winter 1 Jul–30 Sep, spring 1 Oct–31 Dec, summer 1 Jan–31 Mar, autumn 1 Apr–30 Jun.
